title: Brady's absence, Patriots struggles; Baker wins QB competition; Lamar's contract; Rookie Risers
itunes:title: Brady's absence, Patriots struggles; Baker wins QB competition; Lamar's contract; Rookie Risers
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins looking at who has more responsibility over the success of their team: Bill Belichick or Tom Brady. Hosts Jamie Erdahl, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager, and Super Bowl Champion Jason McCourty examine Brady’s absence and the Patriots offensive struggle in the preseason. Next, they react to Baker Mayfield winning the Carolina Panthers starting quarterback job and then they dive into Lamar Jackson’s contract talks with the Ravens. Later, Kyle makes up funny fantasy team names and then the show finishes up with Peter listing his top-5 rookie risers.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
